lagrange.impl.readers

Class ReleaseFileReader_Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • lagrange.impl.readers.ReleaseFileReader_Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReleaseFileReader

    public class ReleaseFileReader_Text
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReleaseFileReader
    Reads release information from a text file. Very old class - may not be functioning properly.
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool
